code: export var authEndpoint="https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize";var clientId="3b6565e3e8104a3294989c18cbbc77af";var redirectUri="http://localhost:3000/";var scopes=["user-read-currently-playing","user-read-recently-played","user-read-playback-state","user-top-read","user-modify-playback-state"];export var getTokenFromUrl=function getTokenFromUrl(){return window.location.hash.substring(1).split("&").reduce(function(initial,item){var parts=item.split("=");initial[parts[0]]=decodeURIComponent(parts[1]);return initial;},{});};export var loginUrl="".concat(authEndpoint,"?client_id=").concat(clientId,"&redirect_uri=").concat(redirectUri,"&scope=").concat(scopes.join("%20"),"&response_type=token&show_dialog=true");
